section.title: Intended Audience
section.p: This section of the User Guide is meant to help those who use the application for editing or reviewing.
For integrators or system admins looking for information about integrating and customizing , see the Web Author Customization Guide.

section.title: What is ?
section.p: is a web-based solution for editing and reviewing XML content across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. It allows you to collaborate, edit, or review content from anywhere, the only requirements being a modern browser and an internet connection.

It leverages the advanced authoring technology of Oxygen XML Editor/Author and it is designed to complement the Oxygen suite of products. You can try on a trial basis by following the procedure in the topic and choosing the Trial type of license configuration.
